The patient's blood pressure is 131/90 mm Hg, the pulse is 77/min, the respiratory rate is 17/min, and the temperature is 36.9°C (98.5°F). Physical examination reveals a sharply demarcated area of skin dryness and erythema encircling her left wrist. Review of systems is otherwise negative.
